name: Eye-scorching colors [Userstyles.org theme]
additional_info: "I prefer not to [use] subjective judgement to remove styles. As long as it can be considered a "valid style", then I'll leave it. People are free to give it bad reviews if it's just crap." [1] "Looks just like the screenshot: Blurry text and eye-scorching colours." [2] "This style was deleted by the site admin. The reason given was "Removed by admin - poorly reviewed"." [3] Is it really as bad as all that? No, not at all - it's worse. From style 23284 (R.I.P) by user 34434. (R.I.P) (Oops, sorry user 34434.)

discussions.name: It could use a bit of improvement
